text: Thanks. I try to use Scoot apps to book next flight  but can‚Äôt seem to find an option for me to utilise the 1000 miles. Any idea how to use it?

Not sure I understood your question. For World Woman  online bonus points applicable for the first S$1500. For Woman  it's the first S$1000.

dbs woman's world mastercard: max 3000 dbs points (6000 miles) for $1500 online spend in calendar monthdbs woman's mastercard: max 1000 dbs points (2000 miles) for $1000 online spend in calendar month
If I booked a flight for someone can I earn kris flyer miles from them?
You earn from cc spend not miles flown.

Whoever takes the flight will get kf miles

Cant link unless you two have the exact same name
